title: Machine Learning Engineer Roadmap: From Foundations to Production
description: Welcome to the path of a Machine Learning Engineer! This comprehensive course equips you with the knowledge and skills to design, develop, and deploy robust machine learning (ML) systems in production environments.

learning_outcomes.title: Machine Learning Foundations
learning_outcomes.content: Master core machine learning algorithms like linear regression, decision trees, support vector machines, and ensemble methods. Understand their strengths, weaknesses, and applications.

learning_outcomes.title: Data Wrangling and Feature Engineering
learning_outcomes.content: Learn to wrangle and clean messy real-world data, preparing it for machine learning models using libraries like Pandas and NumPy. Explore feature engineering techniques to create informative features from your data.

learning_outcomes.title: Model Selection and Evaluation
learning_outcomes.content: Gain expertise in selecting the right ML algorithm for your problem, performing hyperparameter tuning, and evaluating model performance using metrics like accuracy, precision, and recall.

learning_outcomes.title: Machine Learning Pipelines
learning_outcomes.content: Design and build production-ready machine learning pipelines that automate data preprocessing, model training, evaluation, and deployment. Leverage tools like scikit-learn and MLflow.

learning_outcomes.title: Machine Learning Infrastructure
learning_outcomes.content: Explore cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP for deploying and scaling machine learning models in production. Learn containerization technologies like Docker and Kubernetes.

learning_outcomes.title: Model Monitoring and Performance Optimization
learning_outcomes.content: Understand how to monitor the performance of deployed models in production, identify potential issues like drift, and implement strategies for continuous improvement.

learning_outcomes.title: Machine Learning Ethics and Bias
learning_outcomes.content: Explore the ethical considerations of machine learning, including bias mitigation techniques and fairness in decision-making algorithms.
